trans-unit.source: Silent Sentinel
trans-unit.target: Silent Sentinel

trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever Silent Sentinel attacks, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Flying Whenever Silent Sentinel attacks, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: It serves a justice higher than the whims of the gods.
trans-unit.target: It serves a justice higher than the whims of the gods.

trans-unit.resname: PBNG·31★ | Arbiter of the Ideal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arbiter of the Ideal
trans-unit.target: Arbiter of the Ideal

trans-unit.resname: PBNG·31★ | Arbiter of the Ideal | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Inspired — Whenever Arbiter of the Ideal becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library. If it's an artifact, creature, or land card, you may put it onto the battlefield with a manifestation counter on it. That permanent is an enchantment in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: Flying Inspired — Whenever Arbiter of the Ideal becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library. If it's an artifact, creature, or land card, you may put it onto the battlefield with a manifestation counter on it. That permanent is an enchantment in addition to its other types.

trans-unit.source: Tromokratis
trans-unit.target: Tromokratis

trans-unit.source: Tromokratis has hexproof unless it's attacking or blocking. Tromokratis can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls block it. (If any creature that player controls doesn't block this creature, it can't be blocked.)
trans-unit.target: Tromokratis has hexproof unless it's attacking or blocking. Tromokratis can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls block it. (If any creature that player controls doesn't block this creature, it can't be blocked.)

trans-unit.target: Eater of Hope

trans-unit.source: Flying {B}, Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Eater of Hope. {2}{B}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: Flying {B}, Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Eater of Hope. {2}{B}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Destroy target creature.

trans-unit.resname: PBNG·66★ | Eater of Hope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Gods can be appeased. Demons, however . . .
trans-unit.target: Gods can be appeased. Demons, however . . .

trans-unit.source: Pain Seer
trans-unit.target: Pain Seer

trans-unit.source: Inspired — Whenever Pain Seer becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.
trans-unit.target: Inspired — Whenever Pain Seer becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.

trans-unit.source: Fated Conflagration
trans-unit.target: Fated Conflagration

trans-unit.source: Fated Conflagration deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: Fated Conflagration deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

trans-unit.source: Forgestoker Dragon
trans-unit.target: Forgestoker Dragon

trans-unit.source: Flying {1}{R}: Forgestoker Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this combat. Activate only if Forgestoker Dragon is attacking.
trans-unit.target: Flying {1}{R}: Forgestoker Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this combat. Activate only if Forgestoker Dragon is attacking.

trans-unit.source: The Akroans fashion their helms to honor the dragons, not to protect against them, as that would be of little help.
trans-unit.target: The Akroans fashion their helms to honor the dragons, not to protect against them, as that would be of little help.

trans-unit.resname: PBNG·129★ | Nessian Wilds Ravager | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nessian Wilds Ravager
trans-unit.target: Nessian Wilds Ravager

trans-unit.resname: PBNG·129★ | Nessian Wilds Ravager | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Tribute 6 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put six +1/+1 counters on it.) When Nessian Wilds Ravager enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, you may have Nessian Wilds Ravager fight another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
trans-unit.target: Tribute 6 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put six +1/+1 counters on it.)
